text: Pamene iwo osakhulupirira adasunga chidani mâ€™mitima mwawo, chidani cha nthawi ya chikunja, ndipo Mulungu adatumiza chisomo chake kwa Mtumwi wake ndi kwa anthu okhulupirira. Ndipo adawachititsa iwo kukhala omvera malamulo odziletsa ndipo adakhazikitsa bata kukhala pa iwo chifukwa adali oyenera kulilandira batalo. Ndipo Mulungu amadziwa chinthu china chilichonse
